alert.note: Alert for Greene; Pickens (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 18 at 9:50PM CDT until July 18 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR TUSCALOOSA...SOUTHEASTERN PICKENS...NORTHEASTERN GREENE... NORTHWESTERN BIBB AND SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 949 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Splash Adventure to near Brookwood to 7 miles east of Jena, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tuscaloosa, Bessemer, Northport, Hueytown, Holt, Pleasant Grove, Lake View, Brookwood, Coaling, Sylvan Springs, Vance, Woodstock, West Blocton, Coker, North Johns, Bull City, McFarland Mall, Benevola, Lake Lurleen State Park and Tuscaloosa Amphitheater. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
